title: An Act promoting consumer choice regarding the use of credit trigger leads

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Day of Stoneham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1122) of Michael S. Day relative to the use of credit trigger leads.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
